subjectCategories: SPACE COMMUNICATIONS, SPACECRAFT COMMUNICATIONS, COMMAND AND TRACKING
abstract: The LMSS ground segment consists of two types of terminals, mobile and fixed. The salient features of these two components of the LMSS ground segment are discussed. Factors surrounding selection of a modulation scheme for the LMSS are presented. The mobile vehicle antenna, which with its attendant mechanical and electrical requirements pose a challenging problem to the LMSS designers, is covered.
title: The ground segment

publications.publicationName: Land Mobile Satellite Serv. (LMSS):  A Conceptural System Design and Identification of the Critical Technol.

related.title: Land Mobile Satellite Service (LMSS):  A conceptual system design and identification of the critical technologies:  Part 2:  Technical report
